level.heading: Review of Board's decision.
level.text: Any person aggrieved by the decision of the Director may seek review of such decision in the District of Columbia Court of Appeals in accordance with the District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act.

level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 210 of District of Columbia Unemployment Compensation Comprehensive Improvements Temporary Amendment Act of 1992 (D.C. Law 9-260, March 27, 1993, law notification 40 DCR 2330).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-15, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 51-101.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: The District of Columbia Administrative Procedure Act, referred to in this section, is Chapter 5 of Title 2.
